SEARCH
Package DAO

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
User Data access object interfaces only with the user table, it contains function that manipulate the user table for in our database.

    • createUser

      void createUser(User user) throws DataAccessError
      We will create a user when a user registers for the first time
      Parameters:
      user - This will be our model object that will contain the new user information
      Throws:
      DataAccessError

    • validate

      boolean validate(String username, String password)
      This will validate the user when they are trying to log in, this function is used to verify if the username and password combination does exist
      Parameters:
      username - The username
      password - The password of the user
      Returns:
      true or false, false if the username and password combination is not found in the database

      User getUserById(String userID)

      Parameters:
      userID - The users UID
      Returns:
      Will return the users object along with its properties

      User getUserByUsername(String username)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public void deleteUser(User user) throws DataAccessError
      We are removing a user row from the user table
      Parameters:

      public void update(User user) throws DataAccessError
      We will update a table, by editing values within the rows email,firstname,lastname,gender
      Parameters:
      user - we will pass through an object that is a model of the database and update the results so we know the current data in memory
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception
